body:
So yea, I got perm ban, i deserved it, and NOOOOOT trying to ban evade.
Just wanted say bye to all my friends, that's important to me. 
As you know, if im banned, means im leaving....  Im gonna lish ere some friends of me.
( if i forget u dont be angry i just had a big amout of friends here xD )
Ofc, the staff- Thanks for being great, even you banned me. It's your work! Keep being great.

mynameis_ashley- was my wife. My biggest love here. The biggest. i love you ashley. good luck in life.

battleship811- personal friend, i love to rush with u ^.^

cupcake1241- Omg thias dude saved me from ban some times. Thanks so much, alse great friend.

captain_mcpie, MCnerdyguy and xxxheraxxx- My crew  :D

resepignev- Also, great friend. was nice to play with u.

And yea. im too lazy to list ALL the 193747358345684374 others...  :/

Yea, see ya! Good luck in life. make this server better.
I will be active on forums sometimes.. :D
*Lock if u want just wanted thanks to some people*

I will be active on forums sometimes.. :D
